tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage

definition.text: Trigger on conditions require the subchannel direction to be Down and the slope to not be Side at the current 24H candle!

paragraphs.text: We are looking at 1H candles between 9 and 14 hs, on Feb 28th. Those are the candles on which the strategy is triggering and taking the position. Check for yourself!
What is the current daily candle? Think of what you learned earlier about evaluating closed candles!

The current daily candle is the one that closed last: the Feb 27th candle, because the Feb 28th candle hasn't closed yet! Go to the 24H chart and confirm that the subchannel is Down and not Side on Feb 27th!
